id: “Frankly the evidence is not there” Noah Rothman on GA gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams claims that the election was illegitimate
paragraph: MSNBC contributor Noah Rothman and Brooklyn NAACP President L. Joy Williams debate whether or not Georgia gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams has plausible evidence to prove her state's election was run unfairly.Nov. 17, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
